biotools.summary:
Regularized Copula based Feature Selection- Application on Single cell RNA Sequence Data.

The default core, p=20, and Tuning Coefficient-value is (coeff=0.009) for RgCop.

Load the dataset from Data folder, and put the codes and Datasets in same path. Muraro Data is in master branch in this github. Run the DataProcessing.R code. Run the FeatureSelection.R in R folder.

bioschemas.name: RgCop
bioschemas.summary:
